column4: hello all, need a driver for my internal wireless on my averatec 3100 laptop, anyone have any ideas?
hello all, I need a wireless driver for my averatec 3100 laptop, any ideas"
are you sure that even has wireless?
yes, this laptop has wireless, i had it working with vista, but, i hate microshaft and all other proprietary companies so i wiped it
pastebin your lspci
I am sure it has an updated kernal
well, according to http://www.linux-on-laptops.com/averatec.html Averatec laptops are pre-WiFi
so unless you can tell us what wireless chip it uses, nobody caqn help
I will go into bios and figure it out real quick, brb
the bios is not likely to say
ok, websearch then
good luck
it is a 3200 sorry

for the first, just make sure your kernel is at least 2.6.17
it is the latest version of ubuntu....whatever that is
